publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4566 Kenneth Gibson: Inclusion Scotland—That the Parliament welcomes the Homes for Life report from Inclusion Scotland, which highlights issues of significant importance in relation to accessible and affordable housing for disabled people in Scotland and the contribution that it will make to ensuring equality of housing opportunity for all Scotland’s citizens; congratulates Inclusion Scotland for its approach, and wishes Inclusion Scotland every success in its campaign to ensure more accessible and affordable housing for disabled people in Scotland.

S3M-4566 Inclusion Scotland (lodged on 3 July 2009) Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Alasdair Allan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Aileen Campbell*, Rob Gibson*, Christine Grahame*, Jamie Hepburn*, Liam McArthur*
